Cite
====

Our `software paper <https://arxiv.org/pdf/2412.13472>`_  are publicly available.
If you use SocialED in a scientific publication, we would appreciate citations to the following papers::


    @article{zhang2024socialed,
      title={SocialED: A Python Library for Social Event Detection},
      author={Zhang, Kun and Yu, Xiaoyan and Li, Pu and Peng, Hao and Yu, Philip S.},
      journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.13472},
      year={2024}
    }


or::

    Zhang, K., Yu, X., Li, P., Peng, H., and Yu, P.S. 2024. SocialED: A Python Library for Social Event Detection. arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.13472.
